snippet.title: More Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard!!
snippet.description:
More Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard!!

Subscribe to The Spotlight 👉  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

WATCH NEXT: ▶️

RELATED VIDEOS:👇

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gECq8x8b6bo&t=165s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TzqAslwfhig

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UCCh-zVJWCs

This week, American entertainer Johnny Depp lost a defamation suit he filed in London, suing the paper The Sun for considering him a "wife-beater" in one of their articles, a reference to his relationship with ex Amber Heard. The case was terrible, hauling the two entertainers' private lives into the spotlight. It was muddled, as well; each blamed the other for misuse. 
On the Internet, it appears to be that Johnny Depp has many individuals close by. Twitter, Reddit, and different stages are being overwhelmed with images, supporting the entertainer. There are, be that as it may, the individuals who can't help contradicting them. 

On Friday, Heard, 30, was allowed a transitory limiting request against her significant other of 15 months, asserting in court archives that the 52-year-old entertainer genuinely manhandled her all through their four-year relationship. Heard additionally asserted that Depp hit her with a cell and pulled her hair last Saturday night – presenting a new photograph of herself with what seems, by all accounts, to be a wound on her correct eye as proof. A LAPD representative revealed to PEOPLE that officials reacted to the scene however verified that "there was no proof of any wrongdoing." 

In court records reacting to Heard's cases, Depp's lawyer Laura Wasser affirmed that Heard "is endeavoring to get an untimely monetary goal by claiming misuse." As news broke of the claims, many stood up against the case, saying something regarding either side of the contention. Here's who falls where. Depp's ex Vanessa Paradis allegedly went to his safeguard, as indicated by a note acquired by TMZ. 

"In every one of these years I have known Johnny he has never been genuinely harmful to me and this looks not at all like the man I lived with for 14 awesome years," Paradis purportedly composed. 
Individuals couldn't affirm if the letter got by TMZ was really composed by Paradis. Her representative didn't quickly react to a solicitation for input. 

Vanessa's youngest sister Alysson, shared a highly contrasting legacy photograph of herself with Johnny on Sunday. "You are and will consistently be family to me. You are one of the most clever and most adoring individuals I know," she wrote in the subtitle. Depp's 22-year-old little girl Lily-Rose posted a vintage Instagram pic of her and her dad on Sunday, subtitling the photograph with a message of help. 

"My father is the best, most cherishing individual I know," the model and entertainer wrote. "He wasn't anything, nevertheless a superb dad to my younger sibling and I, and every individual who realizes him would say something very similar."

Wasser additionally affirms that Heard exploited Depp at a passionate time his mom having kicked the bucket three days before Heard petitioned for legal separation on Monday. Strolling Dead star Laurie Holden defended Depp on Twitter, in an "enthusiastic response to the attack of an individual via online media and the public objection for complete and utter rumination." "I most definitely will see Johnny Depp's new film," the 46-year-old entertainer tweeted about Alice Through the Looking Glass. "His own life is only that. Individuals. Nobody knows th
e genuine truth so zip it." 
Afterward, Holden explained her remarks, saying that she upholds survivors of homegrown maltreatment and that their claims ought to be secured under full response of the law. "My sole expectation has been basically to support those that are making killing quick judgment calls to stop," she said. 

After co-featuring with Depp in three movies – Transcendence, The Tourist and Mortdecai – Paul Bettany sent messages of help to Depp on Twitter. 
"Known Johnny Depp for quite a long time and through a few connections," he composed. "He's the best, kindest, gentlest man that I've known at any point. Simply saying." Penelope Cruz expressed: I've seen Johnny in such countless circumstances and he is consistently kind to everybody around. He is perhaps the most liberal individual I know. During a half year of my first pregnancy, I went through each and every day with him while we shot Pirates of the Caribbean. clevver news johnny depp appeal amber heard aquaman 2 celebrity newsjohnny depp defamation case

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForDepp #CelebritiesReact #AmberHeardCase #JohnnyDeppCase #TheSpotlight #Aquaman2
